text: hi newbie here question. Can we just forget all the hubl syntaxes and use html/bootstrap in cms instead?

i know wp uses php but hubl seems a little bit of a hassle here (so sorry i don't know reactjs which hubl looks what is trying to mimic based on it's structure so it's a little bit overwhelming to get this)

Yeah, it's a little overwhelming to learn at first, but if you dive in you'll pick it up. I refer to both the HuBL docs and the <https://jinja.palletsprojects.com/en/3.0.x/api/#basics|Jinja2 docs> (I believe I read HuBL is Jinja2 templating language behind the scenes). What are you familiar with?
You won't get very far using _only_ bootstrap unless you want to hand-build every page.
I got a lot out of starting with the HubSpot <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/|CMS Theme Boilerplate>
